api_list.api_description: Returns your IP address in text format
Retrieve the favicon for a specified domain. Optionally, specify the size of the favicon image.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The domain to retrieve the favicon from.

optional_parameters.name: sz
optional_parameters.description: A size hint for the favicon (e.g., 128, 256). Defaults to None, which returns the default size (usually 16x16).

query: Can you show me the IP address of my current connection in text format and also fetch the favicon for the Python homepage?
